segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on getting those cookies, he doesn't realize how unstable that stool is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl waiting patiently for her share, her eyes fixed on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's trying to be quiet so the woman won't hear them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a slippery hazard on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that the woman hasn't noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's lost in thought or just really focused on drying those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside looks so tranquil compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall if he stretches any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman's foot in the puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to step in and prevent an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
